alert.note: Alert for Central Ventura County Valleys; Lake Casitas; Los Angeles County San Fernando Valley; Los Angeles County San Gabriel Valley; San Luis Obispo County Inland Central Coast; Santa Barbara County Central Coast Beaches; Santa Barbara County Inland Central Coast; Santa Barbara County Southeastern Coast; Santa Barbara County Southwestern Coast; Santa Clarita Valley; Santa Monica Mountains; Santa Ynez Valley; Southeastern Ventura County Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued December 13 at 2:17PM PST until December 14 at 8:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 8 AM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures as low as 32 will result in frost formation. Temperatures as low as 28 are possible in isolated locations. * WHERE...Portions of southwest California. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 8 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Frost can damage sensitive plants and harm pets if left unprotected.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.
